reviewText: This disc is letterboxed for 4:3 televisions, which means on today's sets, there is a black bar on the sides as well as the top and bottom.  Come on, WTTW.  Time to toss these old discs and remaster this wonderful program.  And if you do that, could we maybe lose the commercials?  The disc's root menu has a selection for Special Features, but when you go there, "Return to Main Menu" is the only option.  What gives there?
Very well done. Enjoyed it immensely!!
